title: क्या बुर्काधारी औरतों ने बिंदी लगाकर भाजपा का प्रचार किया?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Ok I agreed that there was no bindi on the woman’s forhead, But how can you prove that the woman wearing burkah is a muslim woman and not a hindu?? For seeking muslim votes, BJP can go to a lower extent than anyone can imagine. Rest is upto you.
